# DOtools ![](reference/figures/LogoDoTools.png)

## Overview

DOtools is a user-friendly R package designed to streamline common
workflows in single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) data analysis using
the Seurat ecosystem and third-party tools such as scVI, CellTypist, and
CellBender. It provides high-level wrappers and visualisation utilities
to help efficiently preprocess, analyze, and interpret single-cell data.

# **Installation**

DOtools is currently available through Bioconductor. To install the
package, start R and run:

``` r
install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install("DOtools")
```

We highly recommend having
[conda](https://www.anaconda.com/docs/getting-started/miniconda/main)
installed for python environments. Some functions in this package depend
on Python packages or scripts. These functions use
[basilisk](https://www.bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/basilisk.html)
to create isolated environments, which are built using conda. As a
result, a working conda installation is required.

## **Python package**

If you prefer python over R for data analysis, we also provide a python
version of the DOtools package. Please refer for the python version to:
[DOtools_py](https://github.com/davidrm-bio/DOTools_py)

## **Contribution Guidelines**

Raising up an issue in this Github repository might be the fastest way
of submitting suggestions and bugs. Alternatively you can write an
email: <ruzjurado@med.uni-frankfurt.de>

## **Citation**

tba

# Package index

## Package overview

- [`DOtools`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DOtools.md)
  : DOtools: A Toolkit for scRNA Data Analysis

## Preprocessing

- [`DO.CellBender()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.CellBender.md)
  : DO.CellBender
- [`DO.Import()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.Import.md)
  : DO.Import
- [`DO.Integration()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.Integration.md)
  : DO.Integration SCE object integration directly
- [`DO.scVI()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.scVI.md)
  : DO.scVI
- [`DO.Correlation()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.Correlation.md)
  : DO Correlation Plot for visualizing similarity between categories

## Downstream processing

- [`DO.CellTypist()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.CellTypist.md)
  : DO Celltypist
- [`DO.FullRecluster()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.FullRecluster.md)
  : DO.FullRecluster
- [`DO.TransferLabel()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.TransferLabel.md)
  : DO.TransferLabel
- [`DO.enrichR()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.enrichR.md)
  : DO.enrichR
- [`DO.MultiDGE()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.MultiDGE.md)
  : DO.MultiDGE

## scRNA plotting

- [`DO.BarplotClustert()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.BarplotClustert.md)
  : SEM Graph with t test on cluster level
- [`DO.Barplot()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.Barplot.md)
  : SEM Graph with wilcox test on single cell level
- [`DO.VlnPlot()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.VlnPlot.md)
  : Violin Graph with wilcox test on single cell level
- [`DO.BoxPlot()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.BoxPlot.md)
  : Box Graph with wilcox test on single cell level
- [`DO.Dotplot()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.Dotplot.md)
  : DO Dot plot
- [`DO.CellComposition()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.CellComposition.md)
  : DO CellComposition
- [`DO.SplitBarGSEA()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.SplitBarGSEA.md)
  : DO Bar plot for GSEA df result
- [`DO.Heatmap()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.Heatmap.md)
  : DO Heatmap of the mean expression of genes across a groups
- [`DO.HeatmapFC()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.HeatmapFC.md)
  : DO Heatmap of the mean expression of genes across a groups

## Utils

- [`DO.UMAP()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.UMAP.md)
  : DO.UMAP
- [`DO.Subset()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.Subset.md)
  : DO.Subset
- [`DO.DietSCE()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.DietSCE.md)
  : Remove Layers from Seurat or SCE Object by Pattern
- [`DO.PyEnv()`](https://marianoruzjurado.github.io/DOtools/reference/DO.PyEnv.md)
  : DO.PyEnv
